name: Texas Holdem Offline Poker
description:
Offline Poker at its best!

* Offline Play - play anytime, anywhere
* Beginner friendly - fun and easy, with advice on the earlier levels of play
* Advanced AI - advanced computer opponents if you are up for it
* Gorgeous HD graphics and slick, fast gameplay
* 5 different levels of play (higher difficulty tables have higher stakes)
* Realistic sounds, and smooth animations

*** Note about the AIs (Artificial Intelligences) ***
Please note that the cards are drawn completely randomly and nothing is done to give the AIs any unfair advantage.

That said, the AIs are pretty good. To test the AIs I had them play online on real money multiplayer tables and they could hold their own.
